Desc.entry: Voluntary sector residential care home for older frail people. 25 beds. A Christian Trust. Holds and runs regular weekly events, activities and outings. Has monthly communion, bible study and prayer meetings and a weekly epilogue service. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.

DisabledAccess.entry: Mobile call button located at foot of the ramp

ContactName.entry: Theresa Kennelly, Care Manager/Jenny Taylor, Assistant Manager

category.entry: CARE HOMES FOR OLDER PEOPLE (RESIDENTIAL HOMES)
